Sentencas: The boundary of carbon formation for the dry reforming of methane in direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cells (DIR-SOFCs) with different types of electrolyte (i.e., an oxygen ion-conducting electrolyte (SOFC-O2-) and a proton-conducting electrolyte (SOFC-H+)) was determined by employing detailed thermodynamic analysis.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was found that the required CO2/CH4 ratio decreased with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The type of electrolyte influenced the boundary of carbon formation because it determined the location of water formed by the electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The extent of the electrochemical reaction also played an important role in the boundary of carbon formation.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For SOFC-O2-, the required CO2/CH4 ratio decreased with the increasing extent of the electrochemical reaction due to the presence of electrochemical water in the anode chamber.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Although for SOFC-H+ the required CO2/CH4 ratio increased with the increasing extent of the electrochemical reaction at high operating temperature (T > 1000 K) following the trend previously reported for the case of steam reforming of methane with addition of water as a carbon suppresser, an unusual opposite trend was observed at lower operating temperature.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The study also considered the use of water or air as an alternative carbon suppresser for the system.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The required H2O/CH4 ratio and air/CH4 ratio were determined for various inlet CO2/CH4 ratios.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Even air is a less attractive choice compared to water due to the higher required air/CH4 ratio than the H2O/CH4 ratio; however, the integration of exothermic oxidation and the endothermic reforming reactions may make the use of air attractive.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Water was found to be more effective than carbon dioxide in suppressing the carbon formation at low temperatures but their effect was comparable at high temperatures.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Although the results from the study were based on calculations of the SOFCs with different electrolytes, they are also useful for selecting suitable feed compositions for other reactors; including conventional reformers and membrane reactors with hydrogen removal.
Titulo: Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell
Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell
Determination of the boundary of carbon formation for dry reforming of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell
